name: BunnyMaze
description:
A game made in a few hours for my own game jam. Play as a cute little bunny who's on a mission to collect as many carrots as possible while avoiding the pesky ghosts that are trying to get you. Use the WASD keys on your keyboard to control the bunny's movements and try to dodge the ghosts while you collect all the carrots in 5 intense levels.

Happy hunting!
